dialogs.npcText:
Oook-ook ahhha. 
 *This monkey is wearing a nice blue robe with yellow highlights. They are fully entranced by a glow in their hands.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] Sir, your hands are on fire.

dialogs.npcText:
Oooh Oooh Eeek Eeeeek. 
 *The monkey seems disinterested in you. Perhaps you should get his staff?*
dialogs.secondText: [2] You really want a nerd staff?

dialogs.npcText:
Eeeek eeek. 
 *The robed monkey looks happy to see you, I think he knows you have what he wants.*
dialogs.secondText: [2] This is less cool than I thought.

dialogs.npcText:
Ohhh-eek. 
 *The robed monkey has returned to observing the glow, the staff seemingly gone. He pays you no heed.*

Aaaaw? 
 *The robed monkey turns towards you. From here the glow is much brighter, but you can make out his nerdy face and bare face.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] What wizard doesnt have a staff?

dialogs.npcText:
Eeeeeeek! 
 *The robed monkey curls his lips up and bares his teeth. However, he makes no move against you.*

Aaaaaaah-hah-ha. 
 *The monkey nods, reaching into his robe. He pulls out a map and points to a forest to the north before putting it away.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] So you want a cave staff?

dialogs.npcText: *The monkey grabs the staff, holding it high. Summoning a glow, something shoots up into the sky, followed by a faint boom.*
